item.title: North Korea Nuclear Tests
item.description: North Korea has conducted six nuclear tests since 2006. Event information of six NKNTs Event information of the six nuclear test are summarized by Yao et al., 2018, SRL. Table 1. Summary of event information of North Koare’s six nuclear tests No. Date Time Latitude Longitude Depth (m) Yield (kt) 1 2006-10-09 01:35:27.998 41.2879 129.1083 - 0.48 2 2009-05-25 00:54:43.167 41.
